title: Lankadeepa wins most popular newspaper award
body_lines: Our sister papers Daily Lankadeepa and the Sunday Lankadeepa won the most popular newspaper award for the sixteenth consecutive year at SLIM-KANTAR People's Awards 2022 held this evening at Monarch Imperial, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte.

The awards ceremony was organised by the Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM) together with Kantar Sri Lanka as the research partner for its 2022 edition. Kantar LMRB is one of the world-renowned research company operating in Sri Lanka at present.
